languages.text: "С Расколотого Неба. Вы, дети бездны, любите играть с нашими мыслями. Привозите сюда все новый и новый мусор, сбрасываете нам на головы — все, чтобы поддерживать шаткий фасад вашей лжи! И все время твердите о будущем, которого нет... Хватит!"

"The Riven Sky. You children of the abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the feeble facade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"
languages.original_text: "С Расколотого Неба. Вы, дети бездны, любите играть с нашими мыслями. Привозите сюда все новый и новый мусор, сбрасываете нам на головы — все, чтобы поддерживать шаткий фасад вашей лжи! И все время твердите о будущем, которого нет... Хватит!"

traits.locale_text: "The Riven Sky. You children of the Abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the shaky façade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"

languages.text: «El Cielo Desgarrado. A los hijos del abismo les gusta jugar con nuestras esperanzas. ¡No dejan de traer basura y tirarla sobre nuestras cabezas solo para mantener la fachada endeble de sus mentiras! Y siguen hablando de un futuro que nunca llegará... ¡Ya es suficiente!».
languages.original_text: "The Riven Sky. You children of the abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the feeble facade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"

traits.locale_text: «El Cielo Desgarrado. A los hijos del abismo les gusta jugar con nuestras esperanzas. ¡No dejan de traer basura y tirarla sobre nuestras cabezas solo para mantener la fachada endeble de sus mentiras! Y siguen hablando de un futuro que nunca llegará... ¡Ya es suficiente!».

languages.text: “你来自破碎之空。你们这些深渊之子最喜欢玩弄我们的思想。你们不断把新的垃圾带到这里，把它们倒在我们头上。这一切都是骗局，不过是你们打算维持这个谎言罢了！你们一直在谈论未来，但未来却永远都不会到来……够了！”
languages.original_text: "The Riven Sky. You children of the abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the feeble facade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"

traits.locale_text: “你来自破碎之空。你们这些深渊之子最喜欢玩弄我们的思想。你们不断把新的垃圾带到这里，把它们倒在我们头上。这一切都是骗局，不过是你们打算维持这个谎言罢了！你们一直在谈论未来，但未来却永远都不会到来……够了！”

languages.text: 「割れた空。あんたたち深淵の子どもは俺たちの心を弄ぶのが好きだ。あんたたちは新しいゴミ袋をここに持ってきては、俺たちの頭の上に棄てていく―貧弱なうわべの嘘だけをつき続けている！そしてあんたたちは訪れることのない未来について話し続けている…もう十分だ！」
languages.original_text: "The Riven Sky. You children of the abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the feeble facade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"

traits.locale_text: 「割れた空。あんたたち深淵の子どもは俺たちの心を弄ぶのが好きだ。あんたたちは新しいゴミ袋をここに持ってきては、俺たちの頭の上に棄てていく―貧弱なうわべの嘘だけをつき続けている！そしてあんたたちは訪れることのない未来について話し続けている…もう十分だ！」

languages.text: « De la Fracture Céleste, bien sûr. Vous autres rejetons des abysses n'aimez rien tant que jouer avec nous. Vous nous larguez sans cesse de nouvelles cochonneries sur la tête dans le seul but d'entretenir le voile d'illusions conçu pour dissimuler vos mensonges ! Et vous nous abreuvez de vaines promesses quant à un avenir qui ne viendra jamais... Tout ça n'a que trop duré ! »
languages.original_text: "The Riven Sky. You children of the abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the feeble facade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"

traits.locale_text: « De la Fracture Céleste, bien sûr. Vous autres rejetons des abysses n'aimez rien tant que jouer avec nous. Vous nous larguez sans cesse de nouvelles cochonneries sur la tête dans le seul but d'entretenir le voile d'illusions conçu pour dissimuler vos mensonges ! Et vous nous abreuvez de vaines promesses quant à un avenir qui ne viendra jamais... Tout ça n'a que trop duré ! »

languages.text: "Çatlak Gök'ten. Siz dibin çocukları, aklımızla oynamayı seversiniz. Buraya sürekli yeni çöpler getirip üzerimize atıyorsunuz. Bunu da sırf yalanlarınızın o âciz kisvesini korumak için yapıyorsunuz! Asla gelmeyecek bir gelecekten bahsedip duruyorsunuz... Artık yeter!"
languages.original_text: "The Riven Sky. You children of the abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the feeble facade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"

traits.locale_text: "Çatlak Gök'ten. Siz dibin çocukları, aklımızla oynamayı seversiniz. Buraya sürekli yeni çöpler getirip üzerimize atıyorsunuz. Bunu da sırf yalanlarınızın o âciz kisvesini korumak için yapıyorsunuz! Asla gelmeyecek bir gelecekten bahsedip duruyorsunuz... Artık yeter!"

languages.text: "Aus dem Gespaltenen Himmel. Ihr Kinder des Abgrundes spielt gerne mit unserem Verstand. Ihr leert ständig neuen Müll über uns aus ... alles nur, um die brüchige Fassade Euer Lügen zu wahren! Und Ihr sprecht von einer Zukunft, die niemals kommen wird ... Damit ist jetzt Schluss!"
languages.original_text: "The Riven Sky. You children of the abyss like to toy with our minds. You keep bringing new garbage here and dumping it on our heads — all just to maintain the feeble facade of your lies! And you keep talking about a future that will never come... Enough!"

traits.locale_text: "Aus dem Gespaltenen Himmel. Ihr Kinder des Abgrundes spielt gerne mit unserem Verstand. Ihr leert ständig neuen Müll über uns aus ... alles nur, um die brüchige Fassade Euer Lügen zu wahren! Und Ihr sprecht von einer Zukunft, die niemals kommen wird ... Damit ist jetzt Schluss!"
